column2: I always check the syllabus before I take the class .
I want to become a CEO . I want to run an entire company someday .
He is a difficult customer because he always complains .
(A) What is the objective of this class? (B) It is to learn as much English as possible .
Japan is still a good market for French perfume .
I study statistics on the world population . Japan  for example  has a low birthrate .
I was able to sense what she was thinking because later she let me know I was correct about her thoughts .
It is crucial to predict the weather accurately .
This action may run a risk . The result might not be good . Please be careful .
I work in making electronic components .
Natural food tends to make people healthy . You should eat it .
Apple's brand is very strong . They are world famous .
The global population is growing rapidly . We can expect more people in the world in the future .
We discussed the result of this *case study* . It was very surprising .
I have access to the library because I have a library card .
I like the cool mountain atmosphere because it makes me relaxed .
